column1: Kata Robata////Highly recommend going during happy hour and "trying a bit of everything." The mushroom-oyster from the happy hour specials was too burnt for my liking but I would like to say
column6: and agedashi tofu was amazing! (Eat all the tofu first because it will get soggy if you leave it for last!) I did buy everything from the happy hour special and it was affordable and so worth. I would go here again for sure!
